Github Jekyll

February 23, 2016 en ghost jekyll

After 2 years use Ghost cms I try change for Jekyll. Here detail description in 5 minutes for quick setup for GitHub Jekyll hosted blogs (Jekyll Repository).

Why Github Jekyll?

  • Github support & free hosting
  • Static pages
  • Markdown support

Enough for you.

How setup Jekyll blog for 5 minutes

Sign in github account and fork Jekyll-now repo. Done! Your ready for customize your Jekyll page!

After successful setup process your can check project wiki for details settings like Google Analytics, 404 page and etc.

Online tools
  • StackEdit markdown editor, nice code example.
  • Code template
  • Pandoc file convertor

And also github, githubpage and awesome community! Thank you for the all!
